data.eml:eml: A review of the genus Pelodiaetus Jeannel (Coleoptera, Carabidae, Anillini) of New Zealand, with re-description of the genus, description of a new species, and notes on the evolutionary history

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Sokolov, Igor M. (2019): A review of the genus Pelodiaetus Jeannel (Coleoptera, Carabidae, Anillini) of New Zealand, with re-description of the genus, description of a new species, and notes on the evolutionary history. ZooKeys 879: 33-56, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.879.37684, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.879.37684
